title: Julie Does The Mall: Slutty Shopping Adventure (Cheating Wife)
description: Julie the Slutty Wife continues her exploration of her new found sexual freedom. Julie is feeling frisky and decides to go shopping to take her mind off of her desires. Her shopping trip ignites her desire even more as she finds she is turned on by showing off to the male shoppers, finally giving a very intimate show to the shoe salesman, who gets to 'fit' her for more than shoes. After leaving unsatisfied, she has her first lesbian encounter with the lingerie saleswoman, who brings her home as an 'anniversary gift' for her husband. Julie ends up used and pushed to new limits by the couple, leaving her sated for the first time in a long while. This story includes encounters with strangers, lesbian encounters, toy play with stretching, and a little bit of D/S.
author: Peaches Dean
